subtitle.Text: I really enjoyed playing Gone Home, but I have to say it was pretty exciting to find the Heavens to Betsy tape, y’know, because that was really, I mean, those songs really did come out on a cassette tape at the time

and that really was how people discovered the music, was getting a cassette tape passed around. So getting to put it in an actual tape player and play it and listen to our song? It definitely gave me chills,
I mean it was like, wow, you know, how exciting for a young person today to get that moment of discovery and to listen to our music. I mean it’s, I think it’s great.
